title: So-called Area L in Berenike
description: The ruins of an ancient building with a large peristyle, probably built around the second century AD, in the southwest area of the archaeological site of Sidi Khiribech, in Berenike (modern Banghazi).

properties.description: Representative OpenStreetMap location of the so-called "Area L", in the archaeological site of Sidi Khiribech, in Berenike (modern Benghazi).
properties.title: OSM location of Area L in Sidi Khiribech (Berenike)
